00019 #ifndef _FERMENTABLE_H
00020 #define _FERMENTABLE_H

00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <exception>
00024 #include "xmlnode.h"
00025 #include "observable.h"
00026 
00027 class Fermentable;
00028 
00029 class Fermentable : public Observable
00030 {
00031 public:
00032    Fermentable();
00033    Fermentable( Fermentable& other );
00034    Fermentable( const XmlNode* node );
00035    
00036    std::string toXml();
00037    
00038    // Get
00039    const std::string& getName() const;
00040    int getVersion() const;
00041    const std::string& getType() const;
00042    double getAmount_kg() const;
00043    double getYield_pct() const;
00044    double getColor_srm() const;
00045    
00046    bool getAddAfterBoil() const;
00047    const std::string& getOrigin() const;
00048    const std::string& getSupplier() const;
00049    const std::string& getNotes() const;
00050    double getCoarseFineDiff_pct() const;
00051    double getMoisture_pct() const;
00052    double getDiastaticPower_lintner() const;
00053    double getProtein_pct() const;
00054    double getMaxInBatch_pct() const;
00055    bool getRecommendMash() const;
00056    double getIbuGalPerLb() const;
00057    
00058    // Set
00059    void setName( const std::string& str );
00060    void setVersion( int num );
00061    void setType( const std::string& str );
00062    void setAmount_kg( double num );
00063    void setYield_pct( double num );
00064    void setColor_srm( double num );
00065    
00066    void setAddAfterBoil( bool b );
00067    void setOrigin( const std::string& str );
00068    void setSupplier( const std::string& str);
00069    void setNotes( const std::string& str );
00070    void setCoarseFineDiff_pct( double num );
00071    void setMoisture_pct( double num );
00072    void setDiastaticPower_lintner( double num );
00073    void setProtein_pct( double num );
00074    void setMaxInBatch_pct( double num );
00075    void setRecommendMash( bool b );
00076    void setIbuGalPerLb( double num );
00077    
00078 private:
00079    std::string name;
00080    static const int version = 1;
00081    std::string type;
00082    double amount_kg;
00083    double yield_pct;
00084    double color_srm;
00085 
00086    bool addAfterBoil;
00087    std::string origin;
00088    std::string supplier;
00089    std::string notes;
00090    double coarseFineDiff_pct;
00091    double moisture_pct;
00092    double diastaticPower_lintner;
00093    double protein_pct;
00094    double maxInBatch_pct;
00095    bool recommendMash;
00096    double ibuGalPerLb;
00097 
00098    static bool isValidType( const std::string& str );
00099    void setDefaults();
00100 };
00101 
00102 class FermentableException : public std::exception
00103 {
00104 public:
00105    
00106    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00107    {
00108       // Note: this temporary object might get destroyed too early.
00109       // I'm not really sure.
00110       return std::string("BeerXml FERMENTABLE error: " + _err + "\n").c_str();
00111    }
00112    
00113    FermentableException( std::string message )
00114    {
00115       _err = message;
00116    }
00117    
00118    ~FermentableException() throw() {}
00119    
00120 private:
00121    
00122    std::string _err;
00123 };
